metadata.name: toggle_quality_swf_4
metadata.description: Tests TOGGLE_QUALITY opcode (0x08) - toggles display between high and low quality rendering. Comprehensive test covering basic toggle and multiple consecutive toggles. In NO_GRAPHICS mode, the opcode is a no-op (which is correct behavior).
missing_features: Graphics rendering not implemented (requires SDL3/Vulkan) - quality toggle has no visible effect in NO_GRAPHICS mode
